author: bridge-bot
content:
<dankrad> They will have the tx with commitments. They need to know the data is available to the builder so they can safely include the tx.
Simple solution: Builders publish lists of tx or commitments they have data for
Harder solution: Build a transaction mempools that allows data availability sampling for transactions
